summary:
## Leopard

Leopards are large cats with golden fur and dark spots. They live in Africa and Asia and can grow up to 7 feet long, including their tail. Males weigh up to 159 pounds, while females weigh up to 95 pounds. Leopards live in many different places, from forests to deserts. They eat mostly deer and monkeys. They are good at sneaking up on their prey and can even climb trees with their food.

Leopards are in danger because their homes are being destroyed. They are also hunted for their beautiful fur. People have liked leopards for thousands of years, and their skins are still popular in fashion.
title: Leopard
